mapper.select: select Id from DATA ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: insert into DATA(Id, HdfsFilePath, Title, EventDate, DataType, Location, DetailLocation, ManagerId) values (#{Id}, #{HdfsFilePath}, #{Title}, #{EventDate}, #{DataType}, #{Location}, #{DetailLocation}, #{ManagerId});
insert into NORMAL_DATA(Description, DescriptionImage, Chart, DataId) values (#{Description}, #{DescriptionImage}, #{Chart}, #{DataId});

insert into EARTHQUAKE_DATA(Latitude, Longtitude, Scale, MapImage, TimeSeries, AdditionalData, SensorInfo, DataId) values (#{Latitude}, #{Longtitude}, #{Scale}, #{MapImage}, #{TimeSeries}, #{AdditionalData}, #{SensorInfo}, #{DataId});
mapper.select: select Id, DataType, Title, Location, EventDate, Views from DATA;
